text: Asaperdina brunnea is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Pesarini and Sabbadini in 1999. It is known from China.BioLib.cz - Asaperdina brunnea. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1999
title: Asaperdina brunnea
